member.name: ISearchBoxInfo.GetCondition
member.summary: Retrieves the contents of the search box as an object.
member.param: A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve through ppv, typically IID_ICondition.
When this method returns successfully, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. This is typically .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISearchBoxInfo.GetText
member.summary: Retrieves the contents of the search box as plain text.
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that, when this method returns successfully, receives the full text entered in the search box.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISearchBoxInfo
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow the caller to retrieve information entered into a search box.
